mapper.sql: id, uuid, code, username, password, type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user
uuid, code, username, password, type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update:
update t_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where `code` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
